doc.field: Subseries II:A: American Federation of Labor.
Subseries II:A: American Federation of Labor.

Statler-NY [Appears to be have been shot at the AFL-CIO merger convention at the Statler-Hilton Hotel in New York City. Includes numerous union leaders (negative 686-30 shows David Dubinsky, for example).]
